Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Minnesota in 2019...
Earned first career win on 4/12/2019...
Had first career hit on 4/17/2019, off Wayne Balcom (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2019, winning 2 games with a 1.38 ERA...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,742,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/26/2020 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
